description: "To aid navigation, this map shows small islands, shoals and reefs, maritime routes for use during monsoons or at particular times of the year, bathymetry (sea depth), past explorers’ routes, shipwrecks and text about monsoons, typhoons and currents."
title: "Chart of the East India Islands, [map] : exhibiting the several passages between the Indian and Pacific Oceans; inscrbed to the commanders and officers of the British ships navigating those seas,"
